long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save snippets to Roam Research. Highlight content, click +Roam, and copy the snippet to Roam. The text will be automatically formatted in markdown and include the source of the snippet, with title and URL.
